subject.topic: United States. Federal Civil Works Administration.

subject.geographic: The Great Depression and World War II (1929-1945).

mods.note: Application for approval by the Federal Civil Works Administration of a social sciences research project to be carried on at the University of Tennessee Library. Proposed project involves collecting, listing, and preservation of materials relating to the the Tennessee Valley Area.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
